name: Get Your Coffee
description:
Have you ever wanted to send out coffee to angry, caffeine addict doggo men with swords? Want to do that to some lofi hip-hop music? Well, I've made the game for you. So chill out, grab some coffee, and set the game to fullscreen for the best experience! On mobile, there's a white square anchor to aim so you don't have to reach to the top of your screen on a big phone. Have a great rest of your day! :)

Asset pack:
- Generic RPG pack - https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-rpg-pack
